1.caption: 2023 NBA All-Star Game
1.description: The 2023 NBA All-Star Game will be an exhibition game played on February 19, 2023, on the 30th anniversary of the first All-Star Game held in Salt Lake City. It will be the 72nd edition of the event. The game will be hosted by the Utah Jazz at Vivint Arena, which was known as the Delta Center previously. The game will be televised nationally by TNT for the 21st consecutive year.
